act.title: Dialog Reconstruction
act.intro: Put the sentences below in the correct order. (They are jumbled randomly and appear in a different order everytime you attemp the activity)

item.pinyin: Nín hǎo, wǒ yào yī gè fángjiān.
Nín yào de shì dān rén jiān ma?
Bù, wǒ yào yī jiān shuāng rén jiān.

item.hanzi: 好的，请问您住几个晚上？
item.pinyin: Hǎo de, qǐng wèn nín zhù jǐ gè wǎnshàng?

item.hanzi: 两个晚上，双人间怎么收费
item.pinyin: Liǎng gè wǎnshàng, shuāng rén jiān zěnme shōu fèi?

item.hanzi: 双人间五百块钱一天，两晚一千。
item.pinyin: Shuāng rén jiān wǔ bǎi kuài qián yī tiān, liǎng wǎn yī qiān.
Bāo zǎofàn, qī diǎn bàn dào shí diǎn.
